card.title: Atlas 9
card.shortDescription: First American in space for over a day, Last American solo mission.
card.longDescription: STS-51L was the 25th flight of the American Space Shuttle program, using the Space Shuttle Challenger, which lifted-off from Launch Complex 39-B, at the Kennedy Space Center in Florida, on January 28, 1986. The mission ended in catastrophic failure with the destruction of Challenger, starting at 72 seconds after lift-off, and the death of all seven crew members.
